paragraphs.title: Load Dependency
paragraphs.text:
%dep
z.reset() // clean up previously added artifact and repository
z.load("org.apache.commons:commons-math3:3.2")

result.msg:
Must be used before SparkInterpreter (%spark) initialized
Hint: put this paragraph before any Spark code and restart Zeppelin/Interpreter

paragraphs.title: Model Inputs
paragraphs.text:
// pick your stocks
val stocks   = z.input("1:List of Stocks", "ge,msft").toString.toUpperCase.split(",")
val shares  = z.input("2:Number of Shares", "200,400").toString.split(",")
val fromDate = z.input("3:From Date", "2016-01-25").toString
val toDate   = z.input("4:To Date", "2016-01-27").toString
val sims     = z.input("5:Number of Simulations", 1000).toString.toInt
val sym2Shares     = (stocks zip shares).toMap.toList
sc.parallelize(sym2Shares).toDF.registerTempTable("sym2Shares")

result.msg:
stocks: Array[String] = Array(HDP, GE, MSFT)
shares: Array[String] = Array(400, 200, 300)
fromDate: String = 2016-02-08
toDate: String = 2016-04-11
sims: Int = 150
sym2Shares: List[(String, String)] = List((HDP,400), (GE,200), (MSFT,300))

paragraphs.title: Get Historical Data From Yahoo
paragraphs.text:
//format inputs
import java.util.Date
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
val from = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(fromDate)
val to   = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(toDate)
val (fd,fm,fy) = (new SimpleDateFormat("dd").format(from), from.getMonth, (1900 +from.getYear))
val (td,tm,ty) = (new SimpleDateFormat("dd").format(to),   to.getMonth,   (1900 +to.getYear))

case class StockData (sym : String, Date: java.sql.Date, Open :Double, High : Double, Low: Double, Close:Double, Volume: Int, AdjClose: Double)

val curlStrs = stocks.map(symbol => (symbol, s"http://ichart.finance.yahoo.com/table.csv?s=$symbol&a=$fm&b=$fd&c=$fy&d=$tm&e=$td&f=$ty&g=d&ignore=.csv" ))

import sys.process._
val data = curlStrs
    .map{ case (sym, curlStr) => ("curl -s "+ curlStr !!)    // for each symbol call yahoo
    .split("\n")                                             // split the data into rows
      .tail                                                  // get all lines except header
      .map(_.split(","))                                     // put cols into array
      .map(x => StockData(sym, new java.sql.Date(new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(x(0)).getTime), x(1).toDouble, x(2).toDouble, x(3).toDouble, x(4).toDouble, x(5).toInt, x(6).toDouble) )
    }.flatten

sc.parallelize(data).toDF.registerTempTable("data")

paragraphs.title: Portfolio Stats
paragraphs.text:
%sql select sym, meanPrice, concat(avgReturn, "%") as totalReturn, stndDev, 
concat (ratio * 100, "%") as `ratio %`, 
initialAmt, (initialAmt + initialAmt * (avgReturn * 0.01 )) as currentValue  
from stats

%sql select sum (initialAmt) as initialAmt, 
sum( (initialAmt + initialAmt * (avgReturn * 0.01 ) )) as currentValue,
avg(avgReturn) as AvgReturn from stats

paragraphs.title: Portfolio Aggregate
paragraphs.text:
%sql select sum (initialAmt) as initialAmt, 
sum( (initialAmt + initialAmt * (avgReturn * 0.01 ) )) as currentValue,
concat (cast(sum(avgReturn * ratio) as int) , "%") as AvgWeightedReturn
from stats

paragraphs.title: Monte Carlo Simulation
Daily Value At Risk (Simulated for 150 future days)
paragraphs.text: %sql select  `interval`, symbol, perChange, ratio, (perChange * ratio) as weightedPrediction  from simulation order by `interval`

paragraphs.title: Percentiles
paragraphs.text:
print("%table percentile\toutcome\t\n")
  println(f"$worst%1.2f" + "%\t worst")
  println(f"$typical%1.2f" + "%\t typical")
  println(f"$best%1.2f" + "%\t best")

paragraphs.title: Net Daily Change Percentage
paragraphs.text: %sql select `interval`, (totalChange * 100) as dailyChange from portfolio order by `interval`
%sql select `interval`, sum(value), sum (value * weight) from test group by `interval`

paragraphs.text:
case class test (interval: Int, symbol:String, value:Double, weight: Double )

sc.parallelize(List(test(1,"msft", 10.0, .4),test(1, "hdp", 12.0, .6))).toDF.registerTempTable("test")
%sql select `interval`,symbol, value,  (value * weight) as weightedValue from test

result.msg:
interval	symbol	value	weightedValue
1	msft	10.0	4.0
1	hdp	12.0	7.199999999999999
